name: Atelier Iris 2: The Azoth of Destiny
synopsis: ''Atelier Iris 2: The Azoth of Destiny'' is about an alchemist out to prove himself and make use of his awesome skills. ''Atelier Iris 2'' focuses on two main characters whom you can assume at will. One character embarks on adventures in distant worlds, facing off against enemies via a turn-based battle system. The other character stays behind at home and creates items and weapons.
